alert.note: Alert for Allegan; Kent; Lake; Mason; Muskegon; Newaygo; Oceana; Ottawa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 04 at 10:31PM EST until January 06 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM WEDNESDAY TO 7 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Michigan. * WHEN...From 4 AM Wednesday to 7 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions may impact the morning commute and will certainly affect the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A combination of lake effect snow, strong winds, blowing snow, limited visibility and falling temperatures will make for dangerous travel conditions Wednesday into Wednesday night. Snowfall totals by daybreak on Thursday may reach 6 plus inches in many locations in the warning area combined with blowing snow that will create near blizzard conditions at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Allegan; Kent; Lake; Mason; Muskegon; Newaygo; Oceana; Ottawa
